original_text: Everyone knows the kinds of bad things that weak people want to do. They have sex with people that they are not married to. They do things that are bad and disgusting.
korean_text: 육체의 일은 분명하니 곧 음행과 더러운 것과 호색과

sentences.original_text: Everyone knows the kinds of bad things
sentences.korean_translation: 모두가 어떤 종류의 나쁜 일들을 알고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that weak people want to do
sentences.korean_translation: 약한 사람들이 하고 싶어 하는 것들을

sentences.original_text: that they are not married to
